comments:
I have encontered the following problem on both my home and work machines. I can
update, commit, add and remove items from cvs without problem. What I cannot do
anylonger is compare, retrieve version histroy and functions along those lines.
Both times this appears to have happened after I decided to check the save
password box in the cvs properties for the repository I'm working with. 
Deselecting the save password box and restarting fixes the problem, although
getting the fact that I un-selected the save password box to actually stick took
3 times and me hitting restore defaults for it to work correctly.

Rob
